Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at North/Clybourn
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing North/Clybourn due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing North/Clybourn due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
